turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I'm trying to schedule an appointment with Dr. Ramirez, but the website is giving me fits. It keeps looping back to the login page. So frustrating!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. Let's try another way. Can you provide me with your full name, date of birth, and the reason for your visit so I can check Dr. Ramirez's availability for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's Jane Doe, DOB is 01/15/1988. I need a check-up and want to discuss some concerns about fatigue I've been experiencing. Also, how is it that the website still has these issues? It's been like this for months!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you, Ms. Doe. I have noted your concerns regarding the website. I see Dr. Ramirez has an opening on Tuesday, November 7th at 10:00 AM or Thursday, November 9th at 2:30 PM. Which one works best for you? I will also forward your website feedback to our IT department.
